tool_description: Reverse Phone Lookup API to get owner's name and carrier information for any phone number
name: NumLookup Reverse Phone Lookup API
title: NumLookup Reverse Phone Lookup API

api_list.name: https://www.numlookup.com/api/v1/phone
api_list.description: This endpoint returns owner's name and carrier information for any phone number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://numlookup-reverse-phone-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "numlookup-reverse-phone-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
